lyrics: yogindraṇam cha yogindra guruṇam gurave namah ॥1॥
gunish guninaam beeja guninaam gurave namah
iti stutva shivam natva puraststhau munishwarah
asitena kṛtaṁ stotram bhaktiyuktashcha yah pathet
sa labhed vaishnavam putram gyaninam chirajeevinam
daridro bhaved dhanadhyo mooko bhavati panditah
abaharyoo labhate bharyam sushilam cha pativratam
iha loke sukhum bhuktva yaatyante shivasannidhim
idam stotram pura dattam brahmana cha prachetashe
